SELECT /* BestAppMapper.xml, selectBestAppList, SAC : 이석희 , 2014-01-08 */ KA.TOTAL_COUNT /* 조회 건수 */ ,KA.PROD_ID /* 상품 ID */ ,KA.PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ ,KA.MENU_ID /* MENU_ID */ ,KA.UP_MENU_ID /* 상위 MENU ID */ ,KA.UP_MENU_NM /* 상위 메뉴명 */ ,KA.TOP_MENU_ID /* TOP MENU ID */ ,KA.PROD_GRD_CD /* 이용등급 */ ,KA.PROD_BASE_DESC /* 상품 기본 설명 */ -- ,KA.PROD_DTL_DESC /* 상품 상세 설명 */ ,KA.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD /* IN_APP_BILLING */ ,KA.DRM_YN /* DRM */ ,KA.APK_VER /* APK 버전 */ ,KA.AID /* APP ID */ ,KB.APK_VER AS APK_VER_CD /* APK 버전 코드 */ ,KB.APK_PKG_NM /* 패키지명 */ ,KA.MENU_NM /* MENU 명 */ ,KA.MENU_DESC /* MENU 설명 */ ,KA.PROD_AMT /* 상품가격 */ ,KB.APK_VER AS APK_VER_CD /* APK 버전 코드 */
,NVL((CASE WHEN (KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 0 AND KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE < 1) THEN 1 WHEN KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 5 THEN 5 ELSE ROUND(KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE, 1) END), 0) AS AVG_EVLU_SCORE /* 평점 */
,KA.DWLD_CNT /* 다운로드수 */ ,KA.PATICPERS_CNT /* 참여자수 */ ,KC.FILE_PATH AS IMG_PATH/* 이미지 경로 */ ,KC.FILE_NM AS IMG_NM /* 이미지 명 */ ,KC.FILE_SIZE AS IMG_SIZE /* 이미지 사이즈 */ FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT ,JA.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,IA.* ,IB.DWLD_CNT ,IB.AVG_EVLU_SCORE ,IB.PATICPERS_CNT FROM ( SELECT A.EXPO_ORD ,A.TENANT_ID ,A.LIST_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,A.EXPO_START_DT ,A.EXPO_END_DT ,B.DRM_YN ,B.PROD_GRD_CD ,C.PROD_NM ,C.PROD_BASE_DESC ,C.PROD_DTL_DESC ,D.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD ,D.VER_MAJOR||'.'||D.VER_MINOR AS APK_VER ,D.AID ,F.UP_MENU_ID ,F.TOP_MENU_ID ,(SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_DESC WHERE F.UP_MENU_ID = MENU_ID AND LANG_CD ='ko') AS UP_MENU_NM ,G.MENU_NM ,G.MENU_DESC ,H.SUB_CONTENTS_ID ,J.PROD_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.TENANT_ID ,A.LIST_ID ,B.PROD_ID ,B.MENU_ID ,B.PRCHS_AMT ,B.PRCHS_QTY ,B.REG_DT ,B.EXPO_ORD ,B.EXPO_YN ,B.EXPO_START_DT ,B.EXPO_END_DT FROM TB_DP_LIST A ,TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = 'S01' /* header param : tenantId */ AND A.LIST_ID = #{listId} /* param : listId */ AND B.EXPO_YN ='Y' /* 전시여부 */ AND TO_CHAR(B.STD_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') = #{stdDt} /* 기준일시 */ /* BEST 앱 인기(매출)일 경우 노출시작일자 노출종료일자 조건 추가 */
AND SYSDATE BETWEEN B.EXPO_START_DT AND B.EXPO_END_DT
) A ,TB_DP_PROD B ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC C ,TB_DP_APP_PROD D ,TB_DP_MENU_PROD_MAPG E ,TB_DP_MENU F ,TB_DP_MENU_DESC G ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE H ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD I ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE J ,TB_CM_DEVICE K WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SVC_GRP_CD ='DP000201' /* 서비스 그룹코드 : 앱 */
AND B.PROD_GRD_CD = #{prodGradeCd} /* param : 상품이용등급 */
AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.LANG_CD = 'ko' /* param : 언어코드 */ AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.MENU_ID = E.MENU_ID AND E.MENU_ID = F.MENU_ID AND F.USE_YN ='Y' AND A.MENU_ID = G.MENU_ID AND G.LANG_CD = 'ko' /* param : 언어코드 */ AND A.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = I.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND (F.TOP_MENU_ID <> 'DP000502' OR F.TOP_MENU_ID IS NULL) AND H.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'SHV-E210S' /* header param : 단말코드 */ AND K.USE_YN ='Y' AND I.EXPO_YN ='Y' /* 노출여부 */ ORDER BY A.EXPO_ORD ) IA ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS IB WHERE IA.TENANT_ID = IB.TENANT_ID(+) AND IA.PROD_ID = IB.PROD_ID(+) ) JA WHERE JA.RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 10 /* param : offset, count */ ) KA ,TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS KB ,TB_DP_PROD_IMG KC WHERE KA.PROD_ID = KB.PROD_ID AND KA.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = KB.SUB_CONTENTS_ID AND KA.PROD_ID = KC.PROD_ID AND KC.EXPO_ORD = '1' AND KC.IMG_CD = 'DP000101'

SELECT KA.RN ,KA.SELLER_MBR_NO ,KA.TOTAL_COUNT /* 조회 건수 */ ,KA.PROD_ID /* 상품 ID */ ,KA.PROD_NM /* 상품명 */ ,KA.MENU_ID /* MENU_ID */ ,KA.UP_MENU_ID /* 상위 MENU ID */ ,KA.UP_MENU_NM /* 상위 메뉴명 */ ,KA.TOP_MENU_ID /* TOP MENU ID */ ,KA.PROD_GRD_CD /* 이용등급 */ ,KA.PROD_BASE_DESC /* 상품 기본 설명 */ ,KA.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD /* IN_APP_BILLING */ ,KA.DRM_YN /* DRM */ ,KA.APK_VER /* APK 버전 */ ,KA.AID /* APP ID */ ,KB.APK_VER AS APK_VER_CD /* APK 버전 코드 */ ,KB.APK_PKG_NM /* 패키지명 */ ,KA.MENU_NM /* MENU 명 */ ,KA.MENU_DESC /* MENU 설명 */ ,KA.PROD_AMT /* 상품가격 */ ,KB.APK_VER AS APK_VER_CD /* APK 버전 코드 */
,NVL((CASE WHEN (KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 0 AND KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE < 1) THEN 1 WHEN KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE > 5 THEN 5 ELSE ROUND(KA.AVG_EVLU_SCORE, 1) END), 0) AS AVG_EVLU_SCORE /* 평점 */
,KA.DWLD_CNT /* 다운로드수 */ ,KA.PATICPERS_CNT /* 참여자수 */ ,KC.FILE_PATH AS IMG_PATH/* 이미지 경로 */ ,KC.FILE_NM AS IMG_NM /* 이미지 명 */ ,KC.FILE_SIZE AS IMG_SIZE /* 이미지 사이즈 */ FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT ,JA.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM ,IA.* ,IB.DWLD_CNT ,IB.AVG_EVLU_SCORE ,IB.PATICPERS_CNT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY B.SELLER_MBR_NO ORDER BY B.UPD_DT DESC ) AS RN ,B.SELLER_MBR_NO ,A.EXPO_ORD ,A.TENANT_ID ,A.LIST_ID ,A.PROD_ID ,A.MENU_ID ,A.EXPO_START_DT ,A.EXPO_END_DT ,B.DRM_YN ,B.PROD_GRD_CD ,B.UPD_DT ,C.PROD_NM ,C.PROD_BASE_DESC ,C.PROD_DTL_DESC ,D.PART_PARENT_CLSF_CD ,D.VER_MAJOR||'.'||D.VER_MINOR AS APK_VER ,D.AID ,F.UP_MENU_ID ,F.TOP_MENU_ID ,(SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_DESC WHERE F.UP_MENU_ID = MENU_ID AND LANG_CD ='ko') AS UP_MENU_NM ,G.MENU_NM ,G.MENU_DESC ,H.SUB_CONTENTS_ID ,J.PROD_AMT FROM ( SELECT A.TENANT_ID ,A.LIST_ID ,B.PROD_ID ,B.MENU_ID ,B.PRCHS_AMT ,B.PRCHS_QTY ,B.UPD_DT ,B.EXPO_ORD ,B.EXPO_YN ,B.EXPO_START_DT ,B.EXPO_END_DT FROM TB_DP_LIST A ,TB_DP_LIST_PROD B WHERE A.TENANT_ID = 'S01' /* header param : tenantId */ AND A.LIST_ID = #{listId} /* param : listId */ AND B.EXPO_YN ='Y' /* 전시여부 */ ) A ,TB_DP_PROD B ,TB_DP_PROD_DESC C ,TB_DP_APP_PROD D ,TB_DP_MENU_PROD_MAPG E ,TB_DP_MENU F ,TB_DP_MENU_DESC G ,TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE H ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD I ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_PRICE J ,TB_CM_DEVICE K WHERE A.PROD_ID = B.PROD_ID AND B.SVC_GRP_CD ='DP000201'
AND B.PROD_GRD_CD = #{prodGradeCd} /* param : 상품이용등급 */
AND A.PROD_ID = C.PROD_ID AND C.LANG_CD = 'ko' /* param : 언어코드 */ AND A.PROD_ID = D.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = E.PROD_ID AND A.MENU_ID = E.MENU_ID AND A.MENU_ID = E.MENU_ID AND E.MENU_ID = F.MENU_ID AND F.USE_YN ='Y' AND A.MENU_ID = G.MENU_ID AND G.LANG_CD = 'ko' /* param : 언어코드 */ AND A.PROD_ID = H.PROD_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = I.TENANT_ID AND A.PROD_ID = I.PROD_ID AND A.PROD_ID = J.PROD_ID AND I.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' /* PD000403 : 판매중 */ AND (F.TOP_MENU_ID <> 'DP000502' OR F.TOP_MENU_ID IS NULL) AND H.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND K.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'SHV-E210S' /* header param : 단말코드 */ AND K.USE_YN ='Y' AND I.EXPO_YN ='Y' /* 노출여부 */ ORDER BY A.EXPO_ORD ) IA ,TB_DP_TENANT_PROD_STATS IB WHERE IA.TENANT_ID = IB.TENANT_ID(+) AND IA.PROD_ID = IB.PROD_ID(+) AND IA.RN <= 2 ) JA WHERE JA.RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 100 /* param : offset, count */ ) KA ,TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS KB ,TB_DP_PROD_IMG KC WHERE KA.PROD_ID = KB.PROD_ID AND KA.SUB_CONTENTS_ID = KB.SUB_CONTENTS_ID AND KA.PROD_ID = KC.PROD_ID AND KC.EXPO_ORD = '1' AND KC.IMG_CD = 'DP000101'
